shortDescription.default: Pilot-ready DAC dashboard web part that runs with offline mock data and requires no Graph/API permissions.

longDescription.default: SPFx web part for reviewing DAC ecosystem information in a single dashboard. Designed for low-friction tenant pilots: offline-capable mock mode, no external service dependencies, and no API permission requests.

features.title: dac-dashboard Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the dac-dashboard solution.
